Create Your New ProSolutions Training Account

If you don't yet have an account with ProSolutions Training, please fill in your first and last name (as you would like them to appear on your certificate when you complete a course), an email address, and a password. Your email address will be your username whenever you return to the site, and we will use it to contact you, if necessary. To protect your information, you should use your personal email account, and not an address you share with other people.
This account is all you need to get started: purchase courses, view coursework, take tests, and print certificates!

Your account is being created.
Please wait.
Select a State in order to continue. Your State may have different reporting requirements than others, so in order to ask you the right questions, we first need to know what State you live in.

Professional Development
for Early Childhood Educators

For Educators
Earn state-approved continuing education credits at your own pace.
English
Espanol

For Child Development Associate (CDA) Candidates
Get the required training hours for CDA accreditation and renewal.

For Directors & Teams
Manage your center's staff training and development.

Give ProSolutions Training a Try
Our curriculum team researches and develops each course in our library. The interactive courses feature videos, games, and more so that you can fully absorb and apply the information you learn. You can also find valuable resources and earn 0.10 Continuing Education Units (CEUs).
The platform is easy to follow and each module has a variety of topics. Plus, the Admin Dashboard makes it so easy to make sure my staff are on track with their training and to download reports with one click!
C.S.

"This training was very timely. It has given me the tools I needed to discuss the death of one of my staff members with the children she cared for, as well as prepare the other adults for the questions that will arise."
N.N.

"This was one of the best courses I've taken. It was very user-friendly, it was on point and informative. I would recommend this format to all educators. I learned many new things, it was fabulous!"
N.G.
Get First-rate Customer Support & Free Resources
Our dedicated customer support team is here to help your center succeed. Our team offers free podcasts, best practices, and other helpful resources for our childhood educator community.
Professional development designed for educators, by educators.

Over 200 Course Hours
Across More than 30 Topics
Courses Accepted or
Approved in All 50 States
Educators Give ProSolutions Training
Five Stars of Approval
About ProSolutions Training
For more than 25 years, we've been helping early educators find the best training solutions. Our mission is to inspire potential in those who impact the lives of children. We created an online content delivery system for you. It helps you meet state requirements and get quality training. Each course is IACET approved. You'll earn CEUs and printable certificates. Online training is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. This makes learning easy and convenient for a busy professional like you!

If you don't yet have an account with ProSolutions Training, please fill in your first and last name (as you would like them
to appear on your certificate when you complete a course), an email address, and a password. Your email address will be your
username whenever you return to the site, and we will use it to contact you, if necessary. To
protect your information, you should use your personal email account, and not an address you share with other people.
This account is all you need to get started: purchase courses, view coursework, take tests, and print certificates!
